definition: a place or condition in which no development or progress is occurring
details:
noun
- a place or condition in which no development or progress is occurring
= example: a place or condition in which no development or progress is occurring
- a body of water that was created by a flood or tide or by being held or forced back by a dam
= example: a body of water that was created by a flood or tide or by being held or forced back by a dam
